start_description:
We’re so happy you decided to join us on our mission to make this world a better place. But... how does that work?
We’ll tell you all about it!
step1_title: What do I have to do now?
step1_description:
You’ve installed the extension, everything else happens automagically. When you visit the website of one of our partners Browsy will be activated.
We’ll send you a notification as soon as we’ve planted your trees. Check your personal tree counter in the extension to see how many trees you’ve planted.
step2_description: The webshops you shop at pay us a small commission. We use that commission to plant trees. It won’t cost you a thing.
step3_description:
You can plant trees with Browsy at over 45.000 webshops.
You recognize our partners by the partner logo in the Google search results.
step4_title: When will the trees be planted?
step4_description: Usually it takes 14 to 30 days for the webshop to pay us our commission. We donate that commission to Eden Reforestation Projects, who will plant the trees.
step5_description:
Where they are needed most.
We work with Eden Reforestation Projects. This foundation plants trees in countries most affected by climate change, such as Nepal, Haiti, Madagascar and Borneo.
step6_title:
Invite a friend
and gift a tree
step6_description: Together we go further, so share Browsy with your friends! To welcome them to our community we’ll plant a tree out of their name. A nice beginning to a wonderful future.
